who.title: Who I am
who.text: I am Mamady KONTE, I am 22 years old, developer in training at the Web@cademie by EPITECH. A 2 years training where you learn in an unconventional way!  EPITECH offers project-based learning: no lectures, no rote learning. Projects to be carried out from specifications that are given to us.
who.second: The second year is devoted to testing, proving and improving our knowledge in a company: I am looking for a 14-month work-study contract starting in September 2022.
